import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import SideBar from './SideBar' import UpperBar from './UpperBar' import Footer from './Footer' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ConnectedUser } from '../utils/AuthContext' import { RedirectFunction } from 'react-router-dom' function Layout() { const { connected } = useContext(ConnectedUser) if (!connected) { return } return (
{}
) } export default Layout
